original_title: ひとり妻 熟れた旅路の果てに
overview: Megumi, a housewife who visited Aomori on a wedding memorial trip. Megumi, who arrived at the site prior to her husband, Yosuke, remembers her colleague, Shuko, and her when she visited Aomori, who died with her love hidden in her husband. …
title: Hitorizuma: Ureta tabiji no hate ni
